mapper.select: select c.communityNo as communityNo,c.userNo as userNo, c.communityTitle as communityTitle, date_format(c.communityDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as communityDate, u.username from community as c join user as u on c.userNo = u.userNo order by communityNo Desc;

select c.communityNo as communityNo,c.userNo as userNo, c.communityTitle as communityTitle, date_format(c.communityDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as communityDate, u.username from community as c join user as u on c.userNo = u.userNo where u.username = #{username} order by communityNo Desc;

select c.communityNo as communityNo,c.userNo as userNo, c.communityTitle as communityTitle,c.communityContent as communityContent, c.communityDate as communityDate, u.username from community as c join user as u on c.userNo = u.userNo where c.communityNo = #{communityNo};
